mapper.select: select WORD_ID WORD_NM, KR_NM, EN_NM, KR_ABRV, EN_ABRV, WORD_APPLC_SCOPE, ETC_MATTER_DC, WORD_DFN from term where WORD_ID = #{0, wordId}
mapper.insert: insert into term (WORD_NM, KR_NM, EN_NM, KR_ABRV, EN_ABRV, WORD_APPLC_SCOPE, ETC_MATTER_DC, WORD_DFN ) values (#{wordNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{krNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{krAbrv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enAbrv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wordApplcScope, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcMatterDc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wordDfn, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
